channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 25cabde7-1a6c-4350-8877-cb6fe59f1399
Display name: Azure AI Enterprise Networking Outbound Rules Operator
Description: A Built-in role that can authorize users to access and update the managed network settings of a machine learning workspace.
Link: https://management.azure.com/25cabde7-1a6c-4350-8877-cb6fe59f1399?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 3b5a0aa9-eccd-48dc-9011-f2fd03b5e5f9
Display name: Azure Business Continuity UPI Reader
Description: Lets you view Unified Protected items in Azure Business Continuity Center.
Link: https://management.azure.com/3b5a0aa9-eccd-48dc-9011-f2fd03b5e5f9?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 61aed14c-6c9a-4ed5-aa44-49fc5e96a167
Display name: NginxPlus Contributor service role
Description: Provides access to all Nginx.NginxPlus Control Plane operations
Link: https://management.azure.com/61aed14c-6c9a-4ed5-aa44-49fc5e96a167?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 8b9beb50-e28c-4879-8472-24c9d328085f
Display name: AI Model Scanner Operator
Description: Grants Microsoft Defender for AI access to AI services and resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/8b9beb50-e28c-4879-8472-24c9d328085f?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
